title: Number of arrivals in tourist accommodation Latvia 2006 to 2018
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of arrivals in millions, containing a total of 13 data points.
In general Number of arrivals in millions has rose over the Year.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2008 and 2009.
Maximum Number of arrivals in millions, about 2.8 was reported at Year 2018
Minimum Number of arrivals in millions about 1.11 was reached at Year 2009
